snippet: Technology is a means of enabling freedom, not an end in itself, argues a Google executive.
abstract: Technology is a means of enabling freedom, not an end in itself, argues a Google executive.
lead_paragraph: In an opinion piece on Thursday Op-Ed pages of the New York Times, Vinton G. Cerf, a vice president and chief Internet evangelist for Google, argues that technology is an enabler of rights, not a right itself. Read more in The New York Times.

headline.main: Internet Access Is Not a Human Right
